title: Mobile Learning Course for Early Cancer Detection

context.prior_knowledge: Basic health management knowledge and mobile device proficiency
context.additional_context: Non-synchronous online course linked to language curricula at vocational institutions, teaching early cancer detection information via mobile applications

learning_goals: Learners can explain the importance and methods of early cancer detection within four weeks.
Learners can perform self-examination procedures for major cancers (e.g., breast, cervical) with 80% accuracy using mobile applications.
Learners can accurately convey early cancer detection information in Korean and interpret educational materials.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
